captions.text: Now that Tord is gone how can we continue?
Shall we start the next episode now?

Wait a minute... Where are the... Oh no! NONONO!!
OH GOD NO!!

Err Edd? I erm, I accidentally flushed the
keys down the toilet...

Errr, are you sure we couldn't just get a
plumber?

Don't you remember what happened last time
we got a plumber?
Hey wait! What about a locksmith?!

Man, this place is huge! It's gonna take forever
to find-

Welcome to the wonders from above tour. I'll
be your guide Simon. And to start from what

we have gathered we believe life on the surface
might be a little something like this.
Water! I need water!! OH GOD I CAN'T BREATH!

This is a new addition to our collection.
Not much is known about this pieces exact

use, but we believe it's to be a device used
for cleaning ones ears and other orpheuses.

Now if you walk this way we can find the hall
of discarded underwear...
Shouldn't there be a security camera around here?

SIR! These are the culprits that stole the
latest exhibit!

Summon the troops and spread posters through
the town?
Well, isn't that just a punch in the pants.

Errr yeah, looks like we will have to find
a way out of here.
Well, isn't that just a punch in the pants.
Flap my fins! There they are!!
You have the right to remain silent!
Frank! I hate you. So much.
Looks like we will be safe here for a while.

Hmm for a second there I really thought the
glass was going to break...
Well that's just a let down.

You three ugly cripples have been found guilty
of the theft of a priceless exhibit from our

museum and the release of a dangerous creature
upon our fair city. Your sentence is the most

deadly punishment we have here in Atlantis.
DEATH BY OXYGEN!!
I'm sorry I broke your bass.
It's okay! I'm sorry I broke your cat.
You know I didn't mean that right?

comments.author: Coolkidvg

comments.text:
+Coolkidvg Yeah but Tom even wants Tord to be left alone. There are too 
many crazy fans that are still bugging Tord to come back on the show. He 
wanted to leave the show because he didn't want to be known just for 
Eddsworld or gain all of his popularity from Eddsworld. Tord can't even be 
known by himself anymore because of his choice to leave. The consistent 
questions about coming back to the show is what probably drove him to 
delete his account. I'm sure that Tord was devastated about Edd's death, 
and the fact that he even gave the thought about bringing up Eddsworld as a 
topic with the identity of TORD is enough as is.
